website_summaries.verdict: A very inexpensive set of nine whiskey stones made of natural soapstone. Makes a perfect stocking stuffer or wedding party gift.
pros: The budget stones come with a velvet pouch for storage and chill drinks as advertised
The high-quality stones won't affect the flavor of a beverage and are easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Lots of reviews on here make it sound like these work
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviews on here make it sound like these work. However most of them are not written by the person actually drinking the whiskey. I tried multiple stones in a single serving of whiskey, and they do not bring the temperature down hardly at all. This seems to be a gimmick. Not too expensive, but I wouldn't spend the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mave

customer_reviews.title: That's it?
customer_reviews.text: You would think this would work. But, it doesn't. Left them in the freezer twenty-four hours, then put all nine in a glass of water. It barely had any effect. I could tell it was slightly lower than room temperature. That's it? What a waste of money. Not worth sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this product by the outstanding good reviews so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it had stone particles in my drink when I used it . I wanted to like this product by the outstanding good reviews so I ordered it . I’m not sure why the stone would leave particles when used or if I got a bad batch .
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Cool but doesnt cool your drink.
customer_reviews.text: So here is the thing. They do not make your drink cold like ice will. Not even close, even when stored in freezer. They get cold on the outside but clearly can't transfer the cold. But I think that is intentional?? I heard (after I bought them unfortunately ) that true whiskey drinkers don't drink it cold. Just barely cool. Idk. Kinda was a waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rose Norris

customer_reviews.title: These will not keep your whiskey cold
customer_reviews.text: These will not keep your whiskey cold. I used six of these in a small glass of whiskey (not even enough whiskey to cover all the stones), and the temperature difference was barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Chill
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a stocking stuffer last Christmas. We were excited to use them in our whiskey instead of ice because it can melt and water it down. After washing them I put them in the freezer and they stayed there for almost a month. One evening we decided to try them out and each put 3 in our glass. We were super disappointed! We waited almost 30 minutes and it never chilled our whiskey. In fact, they weren't very cold coming directly out of the freezer. We have tried them twice now and each time the same result. This time I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Hallowell

customer_reviews.title: Stones not cold
customer_reviews.text: i don't like to give poor reviews but these stones just don't work. The beverage just does not get cold.Cannot say much more . This was a colossal waste of money. If you have any tips, let me know. I am surprised to see such good reviews .
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Must!!! Understand how to get the best use
customer_reviews.text: I always read the 1 star reviews before I decide to write a review about anything that I like; the reason is so that I can make sense of what others do not like and compare whether or not I agree. The chillers are made of sandstone which is a fairly light porous rock; so it chills quickly, stays cold and doesn't dilute your drink. If you expect to last all night it won't. These are chillers that are made to use with maybe a double shot of straight alcohol and for that it works perfectly. when used as intended, this is THE one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop using ice!
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using ice and Love the taste of undiluted burbon/wiskey and scotch with these stones. The stones are just the right size, use two or more per drink to chill the drink, it also makes it look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: More of a novelty than a commodity
customer_reviews.text: I could be wrong since these are the first type of whiskey rocks that I’ve ever owned or used, but they are not really all that jaw dropping. I washed them and froze them for about a day and a half, then I put three (3) rocks in my glass and filled my glass to about 3/8 full, I let the whiskey “chill” before I took a drink and I did not notice any dofference in temperature. Frankly, I was disappointed that three (3) rocks didn’t do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: CHILL YOUR DRINK NOT WATER IT DOWN
customer_reviews.text: I started using chilling stones a bit ago - I think they are fantastic - I purchased these as a birthday gift for someone who had never used them before - there were many sets I could have chosen from but I really liked the look of the box and the bag to keep them it - the chilling stones are a great size and she was thrilled to receive them - I know she will enjoy them very much. If you have never tired them you should try these!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works like they are supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a whiskey drinker and wanted these for keeping soda and iced tea cold. They work exactly as promised. I keep them in the freezer and use a few with each drink. My drink stays cold longer then without them without diluted the drink nor adding unwanted tastes that can come with ice cubes. They were delivered when promised and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: buggymeister

customer_reviews.title: Not like Ice
customer_reviews.text: They look "cool" but: We took the chill rocks out of the freezer (after 24 hours) and they felt as cold as ice. We tried a little experiment: We took a cocktail glass with about 7 oz. of tap water at 65 degrees and placed 4 of the chill rocks in the water. After 5 minutes the water was 62. When we took the rocks out they were cool but certainly not "ice cold". Then we repeated the process with 4 ice cubes from the ice maker. After 5 minutes the water dropped from 65 to 45, of course a small part of the ice had melted. As nice as the chill rocks are, real ice works better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: What's the purpose?
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a Christmas present. Thought Scotch was best served at room temperature. If they are supposed to chill the whiskey I did not discern any noticeable difference. I tried the product twice with no results other than I had to wash them and stick them back into the freezer. I worry more about someone accidentally swallowing them and would never serve them to a guest. Anyway they are going back. If you want cold(er) whiskey store your bottle somewhere other than at room temperature or use an ice cube or two. I do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: You can chill your bourbon or whiskey without watering it down!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my whiskey stones online to supplement a set I had purchased at a liquor store for about half the price. This made my purchase even better. The stones do not chill you liquor as much as ice, but they aren't meant to either. What they do is chill your liquor without watering it down. They are reusable and easy to maintain. I take them with me to BYOB social functions and often share them with friends for their drinks. So far everyone has enjoyed using them. One set will not be enough, might as well get two.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Big Fat NO
customer_reviews.text: If you are gifting and want nice presentation, these are not the “Whisky” stones for you. They come in a cheap box (not like the one pictured) filled with spelling errors and typos. The stones themselves weren’t uniform. In size or color.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME! I bought these for my boyfriend who is a huge scotch drinker. So we put them in the freezer for over 48 hours. Upon taking them out, they seemed very cold to the touch, but when he put them in his drink they barely chilled it. Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't cool like ice
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something that cools your whiskey/whisky like ice without watering it down this is probably your best bet. However, it doesn't cool as well as ice does. I found that the best mixture for me is to add that drop of water and these, it works pretty well. Perhaps my expectations were too high/unrealistic but I really wanted my whisky to get as cold as ice without the watering down.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bachmann

customer_reviews.title: Casuals only :)
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is the stones have about 1 hour of coldness until they become room temperature. This is fine for me because I typically finish my drink sooner than that. This becomes an issue when hanging out with friends and sampling different whiskeys and just drinking for a long time, where just 9 stones are not enough to rotate a batch between the freezer and our glasses and after 1 hour we might as well just not use them anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Balmung

customer_reviews.title: Totally unsuitable for cooling a drink - returning these
customer_reviews.text: Notice how the product photos include some shots of the packaging? But there is no photo of the BACK of the box, where it says that each stone is 2 centimeters on a side (that's TINY, compared to an ice cube) and they advise you to "Use 3 stones per drink and let them stand for 5 minutes." Uh-huh, my friends and I are going to stare at our freshly poured drinks for 5 minutes. This is a lousy concept. I'm returning mine unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Yakfish

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband since it was on his wishlist. let me first say I was disappointed at the size of the stone cubes, but I could have overlooked that detail, but what was even more disappointing was the stone cubes didn't keep scotch cold. It was in a glass and the stone rocks had been in the freezer for 8 hours. But it was cold after 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Whitson

customer_reviews.title: My first time with Whiskey Stones
customer_reviews.text: I've just recently gotten into drinking bourbons and scotches and wanted to try these as to not dilute the whiskey while drinking. I left them in the freezer for about 3 days before first using them and they worked as advertised. They do not really cool your drink very much so do not expect the same effect as steel or ice but they do bring the beverage down a few degrees below ambient. They would make a great gift to the whiskey drinker in your group though and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It says to wet and put in freezer. Well firstly they will freeze together obviously. Now they keep my stuff cool(not cold) for a bit but it doesn’t take long for them to warm to room temp kinda. But I hate ice because I don’t want my drink watered down. Over all if you drink fairly quickly then your good but I take forever to finish a drink. I want to sip.
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Product
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition to my home bar. This product beats even my local liquor stores product! I will always buy from this seller because thier product is exactly what it says it was and works fantastically. They clean very easy and keep drinks cold for at least 45 minutes without diluting my drink. Great Company. Keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep your drinks as cold
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my boyfriend who loves his whiskey very chilled and not watered down. Decided this wouldve been perfect for him so I bought this for him. It was simple to use and froze quickly. It felt cold in our hands but when we used it with our drinks, it didn’t really keep our whiskey cold as expected. We’ve had better and decided to return this
customer_reviews.author: Kimster

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT STAY COLD, DON'T WASTE THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: These are not good for keeping any alcoholic drink cold! They're a fun conversation piece but don't expect a cold drink when using them. They don't stay cold longer than 1-2 minutes top no matter how long you've allowed them to chill in the freezer. Save your money and look elsewhere. As I said, good for a gag gift for a drink "on the rocks"
customer_reviews.author: LEONARD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a set of whisky stones for awhile, but the ones I liked were overpriced or poor quality. I saw these and decided to give them a try. Excellent - real soapstone so they won't scratch my good crystal whisky glasses and they hold the chill well. Very easy to clean and attractively packaged.
customer_reviews.author: K. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: To state it perfectly. THEY DON'T WORK!! Better to buy a sling shot and use them for target practice. I guess the old adage is true. There is a sucker born every minute! What were the people drinking that gave these positive reviews!!!???
customer_reviews.author: tdog1053

customer_reviews.title: Placebo
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't accomplish anything besides taking up space in your drink. Might get the last sip below room temp if you use them all. I got these cause I was fed up with dollar store ice trays but I guess I'll just invest in better ice trays since these don't accomplish anything for any beverage. They get frost on them after a few hours in the freezer but all that is gone instantly as soon as they go in your drink. Edit: after about 25 uses, they start leaving a very unpleasant aftertaste as well
customer_reviews.author: jas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cool at all
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other negative reviews: these do not cool your drink at all. I first placed them in the freezer for a couple days in the pouch before I tried them, and they didn’t cool my drink. I then put them in the ice bin outside of the pouch for several days, and they still didn’t work. I even used 6 stones for a single shot of whiskey! Didn’t cool. So they’re essentially useless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: If you're expecting an ice substitute, I would hold off
customer_reviews.text: Tried multiple products from different sellers and none of them really chilled spirits as expected. If you're expecting an ice substitute, I would hold off until the technology improves.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking for some of these as a gift for my relative. Most places were quite expensive, but these are so reasonably priced and come in a nice, very gift-able box. I recommend these for a gift. I will update if there are any issues once the recipient of these starts using them.
customer_reviews.author: Dazednconfused

customer_reviews.title: Chill anything (a few ounces)
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I bought some plastic freezable "fruit" and I had tried using polished stones that I've collected over the years, but there was a taste associated with them. These chill nicely and there is no flavor to them. I simply rinse them off, dry them and put them back in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Applin

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Touch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chilling stones as part of a theme basket for a birthday gift. I thought they were a very nice touch to have instead of ordinary ice cubes. My friend loved the whole idea & said I thought of everything. Sometimes its the little personal touches that show you care. These chilling stones were a personal touch!
customer_reviews.author: Maria C Cascione

customer_reviews.title: They look cooler than they make your drink
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to buy whiskey stones for a while now but just never pulled the trigger until recently. I have had these for a week or two and initially tried only two stones in a standard pour, but they did not drop the temperature of the whiskey at all. I then used all stones in a single pour and my drink is slightly cooler, but not cold at all. I will be sticking with ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Don't Dilute Your Good Bourbon with Ice!
customer_reviews.text: We like just a very slight chill in our favorite bourbons, but it is sacrilegious to dilute it with an ice cube. These stones solve the issue. Keep in freezer, then drop one or 2 in your bourbon neat. I like to leave mine in for just a minute or 2. Remove the stones, rinse off, store back in freezer once they are dry. And enjoy your undiluted bourbon at the perfect temp.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P

customer_reviews.title: Chill your favorite sipping whiskey or small batch rum!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific way to chill your best whiskey, sipping rum, liquer or cordial with these chilling stones. Store them in the freezer and just pop them into your glass. Better than ice because they don't water down the whiskey/rum/liquer. Just rinse off and pop back in the freezer for use another time. Packaged nicely for gift giving. These arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: BookLoversinFL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but too small
customer_reviews.text: The stones are smaller than expected. Another thing, they don't seem to stay cold as long as I expected. It may be because I did not use all of them at the same time. But, they are nice and seem to be good quality. They come in a nice box and in a fine bag to store them in. I'm not sure the storage bag would keep any flavors or smells to absorb into them so I placed them in a plastic zuplac bag. I would recommend them as they were a good price. Yet, I would not recommended for a party as, like I said, they are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Odaicerp

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and do chill your drink, but they do not chill it as well as ice does. I follow the instructions: "Three stones in your drink to sufficiently chill it" but the glass does not get chilled. These may work better if you pre-chill your drinks and glasses though I have yet to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely satisfied, will definitely buy from the sellers again!
customer_reviews.text: These stones are absolutely fantastic. I had been searching for a small set of whiskey stones for my fiance for quite some time these were absolutely everything that he and I were looking for. The stones are absolutely gorgeous to look at, as a geology enthusiasts, I can't help but stare at them because they're so pretty. Everything arrived so quickly and was so carefully packed. And there wasn't a single hiccup through the whole process. if you two are also searching for whiskey stones that are high quality, reasonably priced, and handled with more love and care than what you can find at a Walmart or Target I would 100% recommend buying these stones from these sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rider

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: When adding ice to a whiskey, or any alcohol for that matter, the dilution of the melted ice dramatically changes the taste. However, when you use whiskey stones in lieu of ice, you don’t get this dilution all effect. These particular whiskey stones for exactly what I was hoping to receive. They are small enough to fit in a whiskey glass and there were enough of them to share with a guest or two. Additionally, they come in a nice pouch with a tie-string.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ward

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend these to any whiskey connoisseur
customer_reviews.text: The order came promptly and was packaged nicely with a velvet pouch (which I will use for something else later). The stones work as advertised, by chilling my scotch or bourbon without watering it down. I'd recommend these to any whiskey connoisseur. I keep them in a bowl in the freezer so they're always ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: Scotto

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: These stones did not work for me. Put in freezer over night. Next day I poured myself a Scotch with these stones in the glass, the did not chill down my Scotch at all. I returned them right away. They might work if a person would freeze their glass and their Scotch first, then these stones "might" keep your drink cold, maybe.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a Christmas gift and liked them so much I got some for my best friend for her birthday and my dad for Father's Day too! They're super easy to clean and don't take up much space in the freezer. I love being able to sip my whiskey without watering it down with ice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I like them
customer_reviews.text: I like them. I usually use 3 at a time. And I don't know that it cools the drinks a ton. I certainly didn't do any hard tests or comparisons. But I feel like they are exactly what I expected, and I do enjoy them, which is much more than I can say for a lot of the stuff I buy.
customer_reviews.author: H Berberick

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality, Even when compared to much higher priced comparable items.
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted some "rolling glasses" and we needed some to hand out for "thank you" gifts. These seemed to fit the bill. The vendor even adjusted my order to save shipping when I realized I wanted two boxes of 6,,,,not just one. They are exactly what we hoped for. Trustworthy merchant, indeed,,,,,,with high quality merchandize!
customer_reviews.author: Joetechco

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay cold
customer_reviews.text: I've put all of these in a very small glass of whiskey (1 finger, not 2) and they clanked around so hard I thought the glass was going to break and they didn't manage to do much to cool down the whiskey. I wasn't expecting ice cold but I was expecting better than luke warm.
customer_reviews.author: MR Kal

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your time or money. They barely change the whiskey/scotch from room temperature. Have tried different freezers and temps, still doesn't work like advertised. Disappointing especially considering the high reviews when I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: While the concept is a good one, these little stones don't even begin to work. I have used them in whiskey, but they didn't work. I stuck them back in the freezer and rediscovered them last night. I got them out to try in red wine...it's so hot I was hoping to chill my wine a bit. Not only didn't it help chill my wine, my wine captured the taste of whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: nancy dow

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, easy to clean/use but they do not work well. They don’t keep the whiskey very cold for very long. Maybe 10 minutes tops. I’d rather put ice in my whiskey & risk watering it down then use these.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Ok but wished it cooled more
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean but I found it only cools the whiskey just a little bit... Maybe 5 to 10 degrees. I was hoping for more cooling myself but can't fault the product for that. The other thing is I wouldn't use this in anything other than a rocks glass or plastic. I tried it in crystal and the rocks banging around the glass had me concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are as good as any I've used before and half the price. 3 will keep your two fingers of your beverage cool for a sippin' period. Just dampen and freeze for a bit before using. Even better if you chill the glass first too.
customer_reviews.author: inthedark

customer_reviews.title: 9 grey beverage chilling stones with bag
customer_reviews.text: These are just the right size to put into your drink. They come in a bag, so when you freeze them, they don't get lost. Haven't used them in a glass yet, they are still in the freezer, but I expect them to keep my drink cold and not watered down like other chilling stones I have used. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry R.

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and just buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These things are the real deal. They keep my whiskey at a cold temp, but not freezing. Best thing is the world is cold, unwatered down whiskey. These things don't disappoint. Cleaning is super easy, and they get cold pretty fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel dork

customer_reviews.title: Carbonation last longer
customer_reviews.text: One drunk night I figured I'd put these in my normal drink of vodka and seltzer and realised that these also help to keep the beverage more carbonate longer. Bubbles seem to keep coming, normally don't use ice. Make sure you get these dry before putting in freezer, they stick together like anything else would with water in the freezer, otherwise pour your drink over them to dethaw and separate them
customer_reviews.author: M. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Set your expectations correctly
customer_reviews.text: These rocks do a nice job of gently cooling my scotch which in the warmer months with no AC I enjoy. They will not make it cold as ice. (It's a thermodynamics thing which seems a little deep for an Amazon review.) What they will also not do is dilute your whiskey which is a great thing. These rocks are a great value and come with the nice cloth bag foregoing the fancy box. I don't need the box as I keep all nine in a bowl in the freezer at all times and I use them three at a time. I'll get the bag back out of the drawer when winter gets here.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: The product doesn’t do what it promises.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy these as a gift for my Whiskey loving husband. He was excited to receive them as well, that is until he tried them. They don’t work at all despite following the instructions to a tee. Very disappointed. A 100% waste of hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: NancyAyn

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Don't cool drink.
customer_reviews.text: Second set of whiskey rocks I've purchased that don't actually cool the drink nearly enough. Buy these instead. You're welcome.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Cool, not cold
customer_reviews.text: They don’t seem to chill a drink very efficiently, but they do cool it down a bit, and they obviously don’t dilute your whiskey...so there’s that. Maybe more cubes than what they recommend would help, but then you’ll need more than what comes in this(9)...unless you’re drinking alone.
customer_reviews.author: brntorange

customer_reviews.title: These stones are a great alternative to ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: These stones are a great alternative to ice cubes! They don't melt, thus diluting your beverage, and they hold their chill well. The only adverse quality of the stones is that they sit at the bottom of the glass and we drink from the top, unless a straw is being used.
customer_reviews.author: Kj1011

customer_reviews.title: No Watered Down Whiskey
customer_reviews.text: These are the second set of Whiskey Stones I've purchased (the others were at a retail store). I find you need a couple sets if you plan on having a second drink as they work once if you're just sipping your drink...I suppose if you're slamming them back, you could get a couple uses before sending them back to the freezer. If I'm drinking something with a bit of a kick, I'll usually go with ice so it bleeds a little water for smoothing purposes but these are great for the tamer stuff.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well. However, I'm an ice freak and have to have my cold beverages more than just cold and consequently, these don't work quite good enough for me, but they do as presented, keeping your beverage cold and not watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fast and well presented but not quite so cold
customer_reviews.text: The product came extremely quickly and was exactly what I expected. They are simple but well presented. The only problem is that they don’t quite work as well as some others I have tried. Hopefully with time they get better.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these after reading so many mixed reviews, but all the other ones also had mixed reviews at this price point - so took a chance. Unfortunately, for me, they did not keep any drinks cold. My husband was super excited and thought they were a thoughtful gift, but was disappointed. We thought maybe if we froze them for longer before use, but they still did not work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This chilling stones work great, it takes away the water residue that ice will leave in your beverage. When you are done you just wash them with water and stick back in the freezer and wait to use them again. I recommend then highly
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product.
customer_reviews.text: My lady loves this product. She drinks whiskey does not like to have the ice dilute the drink. So this works well for her needs Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: pl38

customer_reviews.title: These were... disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Thought that these would be great for scotch, since they wouldn't water it down but still chill it. Guessing that they just aren't very good at transferring cold. Left them in the freezer for over a week, tried 3 of them. Same temperature. Tried 6 another time. Barely cooler. Tried all 9 and it was still slightly cooler but still more or less room temperature. They're neat looking and easy to clean. Maybe they'd do better keeping the drink cold if it was cold already.. don't know. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Hardly chills your beverage
customer_reviews.text: I added 3 and even so it did not chill. I mean I know it's not the same thing as ice but it wasn't even half as good. It's cheap and therefore not too ticked off but figured with a low price point was worth the try. I even tried waiting several minutes to see if it was chilled but it still would not really be cold
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great stones
customer_reviews.text: we really love our chilling stones. I think I have been using them more than my husband who was the intended user. I loved the pouch they came in. They are nice quality and work really well with my Jameson Black Barrel.
customer_reviews.author: RWalker74

customer_reviews.title: Cooling rocks
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty cool, but they didn’t “chill” my drink. I ended up trying all 9 of them over a couple ounces of tequila, cooled it a little. I think getting that one big rock (or ball) to put in the glass would be better, more surface area hitting the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great but he said they did not do much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband just to see how they were since they were only $10 and I needed a cheap stocking stuffer. The idea is great but he said they did not do much as far as cooling his drink. They are pretty small too. I won't return them because it's not worth the hassle!
customer_reviews.author: ELMA16Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product, beautifully packaged.
customer_reviews.text: My whisky aficionado lamented that his whisky dilutes with ice cubes in it, oh my! He recently said if he had "whisky stones" his drink would stay cool as he sipped, without getting watered down. GASP that our local distiller didn't sell such a thing, so off to Amazon I "clicked". These are a GREAT product. Feel comfortable packaging with a bottle of whisky and giving as a gift. They come with a beautiful velvet, drawstring pouch. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Goodwill

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but you have to use all 9 to cool a rocks glass even a little
customer_reviews.text: Got theses as a stocking stuffer for my boyfriend for Christmas. According to him they work ok, but don't really get a drink cold even when using all nine. Honestly, they haven't been used since the end of December when he tried them out (reviewing in April).
customer_reviews.author: Real Person

customer_reviews.title: Meh. The stones and bag are exactly as described ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. The stones and bag are exactly as described, but honestly, even 3 or 4 of them won't keep a finger of bourbon cold for more than 10 min. Don't really see the point... Save your money and save up for a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Kenz Hay

customer_reviews.title: great for those who forget how to make ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my sister, she never has ice cubes . She has not used them yet , but she got a kick out of receiving them . I thought it was a great idea so I got a set for myself . Very nicely packaged and great idea for not having you drink diluted . Perfect for drinks on the rocks .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changes drink taste and doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: They're alright. I don't know if it's all in my head or not but they seem give my whiskey a slight gritty texture. Like stones would. (Only saying this because the description says they don't change you drink's taste.) They obviously cool the whiskey in the glass, but only slightly and the stones go back to room temp pretty fast. Good for about one drink. Good thing they aren't expensive. Most likely wont use them again.
customer_reviews.author: AleSmith

customer_reviews.title: They just don't work.
customer_reviews.text: I put all the stones in a glass of whiskey and they made it slightly cool for 15 minutes. Just use an ice cube or steel cubes, they retail coolness way better than stones.
customer_reviews.author: Cinema4

customer_reviews.title: Don't work well for wine
customer_reviews.text: These just don't work for me. Got them to chill glasses of wine poured from a room temperature bottle. When following the directions, the glass of wine only gets mildly cooler, not cold as it would with 1-2 cubes of ice. I've tried many things - freezing the stones in something other than the velvet bag, keeping them in the coldest part of the freezer, using 4-6 of them at once, etc. Nothing has worked for me. I really really wanted these to work, as I love a nice cold glass of white wine at the end of a long day, but they just aren't what I'd hoped they'd be.
customer_reviews.author: S Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What It Is Advertised To Do
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my stepdad so I cannot speak to any firsthand experience with these. However my stepdad has become something of a whiskey “enthusiast” (of the armchair variety, that is) in the last couple of years and he was pretty excited to try these out. He reported that they did exactly as they advertised in that they kept it cool over a period of time and he has used them on several occasions. Unfortunately I cannot offer any further insight. I will say he is particularly thrilled that he does not have to contend with watered down liquor any longer.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Keep your drink cold and don't dilute it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product at a very good price. Presented in a very nice pouch that matches the quality of the product and the ease to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t work at all, I left the cubes pm the freezer the suggested time and they don’t work. It doesn’t chill at all the beverage .Returning the item
customer_reviews.author: ALomeli

customer_reviews.title: Great for chilling fine liquors
customer_reviews.text: I love using these. They are great for chilling a drink without watering it down. My only recommendation would be to wash them after removing them from the bag as sometimes little fibers may come with them. otherwise 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a good friend of mine. He loves them, chills his bourbon without watering it down, he doesn’t know how he’s lived without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chilled whiskey
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a big whiskey and bourbon drinker but was constantly fighting with it getting watered down with normal ice and even big nice cubes so I invested into these chilling stones and they are doing the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend to use in his whiskey so it wouldn’t get watered down by ice cubes. These stones are wonderful! They hold onto their cold temperature for a long period of time, leaving the drink extremely refreshing. Cleaning them after is quick and easy. Having a set of 9 helps if you’re going to have multiple drinks in one sitting. Then just put them back in the freezer for a couple hours and your ready for another round!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: I concur, waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: To agree with many of the other negative reviews - these look cool, but that's about it. I'm a sipper, but these don't even start out cold - once you put the whiskey in, they don't cool it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W.

customer_reviews.title: What is the best cleaning method after use?
customer_reviews.text: I have only used them a couple of times but not really sure if they actually cool the beverage or not. Better cleaning instructions might be helpful as well. The two times I've used them I just rinsed them off with water and put them back in the bag. While cleaning I had to hold them in my hand and rinse them off then i dried them off with a paper towel. I am not sure if that is enough or if I am supposed to do more. I think I still have the instructions so I will check that out.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Violett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but they don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: This by far was the worst purchase I’ve ever made from Amazon. Product appeared as advertised, even showed up when they were supposed to. However, they do not work. They don’t maintain coldness and they do not cool your drink. I’m back to just putting ice in my drink. They look great but they do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item as a gift to my wife's and I wedding officiant. He loved them. He enjoys himself a glass of whiskey on some afternoons but is insistent that the ice cube water dilutes the taste. He can now enjoy chilled whiskey without losing any of the taste he loves. Makes a great gift and the person will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Petey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: While the idea seems good, the cubes are too small and lose their cool too quickly. It can't even cool down a glass of water.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Flanders

customer_reviews.title: So so for keeping beverages slightly chilled. Don't stay cold for long.
customer_reviews.text: Not too impressed with these. Bought these with some ice molds and whiskey glasses and prefer the ice molds. These just don't get my drinks cold enough and they don't stay cold very long. Ice molds are a better alternative. Haven't tried the metal drink cubes, which may work better.
customer_reviews.author: SierraPrimeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your drink from getting warm and deluted
customer_reviews.text: I think they're stylish to say the least. They don't make your drink cold BUT, when put in freezer after a while, they seem to slow the process of your drink getting warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Cool, not cold
customer_reviews.text: They are cool. They look cool too. Well made and all that but if you're buying it as a gift make sure that the person receiving them doesn't expect an ice-cold drink. Even with properly chilled stones and five or ten minutes to cool the drink.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dundas

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Esthetic
customer_reviews.text: I love the esthetic appeal of this item. Paired with quick delivery and friendliness of the “mom and pop” company coulter of the seller, and you have a quality product that Is sure to make your house guests think more highly of your whisky recommendations. No plastic taste, like you find with other reusable ice cubes made of lower quality, and they truly hold their chill much longer than metal ones.
customer_reviews.author: Davarius

customer_reviews.title: Ice cubes are better
customer_reviews.text: They look nice and come in a nice bag. These stones won't water down your whiskey, but they don't make the drink cold. The whole point of these stones is to make the alcohol cold, which it fails to do. The product description recommends using 2 or 3 rocks in your drink, that did not chill the whiskey. So the next time I used 4, still did not work. Then I used six of the stones (looks ridiculous for a glass of whiskey) and that still did not chill the liquid. I would not recommend buying these; using 2 or 3 ice cubes is better.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept
customer_reviews.text: So as a person who enjoys a drink every now and again I don't like for my drink to be watered down. So I bought these with me who that they would cool my drink down without making it watery. These things are easy to clean but they don't provide any type of coolness to your drink but drinks still warm when I put these in I personally don't like to chill my liquor and I'd like to drink it on the rocks. This product has a cool concept I just wish it would work
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A Morris Jr

customer_reviews.title: Too small and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Stones are incredibly small (the size of sugar cubes) and do not hold their ability to keep a drink cool for long. If I hadn't already used them once, I would've returned them.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adult beverages
customer_reviews.text: Where have these been all my adult drinking years! Great for whiskey or any other drink you don't want watered down. Nice velvet pouch to sure them. Great addition to our bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome gift! My brother-in-law was surprised and impressed at the quality and presentation. Definitely one to remember for future gift giving. Worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Daiker

customer_reviews.title: Ask Away
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend because he helped me move to the town that he resides in. He dumped me after a week, so you'll have to ask him how well these work.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

product_meta.title: Set of 9 Grey Beverage Chilling Stones [Chill Rocks] Whiskey Stones for Whiskey and other Beverages - in Gift Box with Velvet Carrying Pouch - Made of 100% Pure Soapstone - by Quiseen
product_meta.description: Chill Rocks is the aficionado's choice for “on the rocks”. It eliminates a common problem for all connoisseurs of fine distilled spirits. It will add the perfect chill without diluting it down. Now all your favorite drinks are able to be served the way they were intended to be, pure and properly chilled. Chill Rocks are non-porous, meaning, there is no odor or taste to tarnish your drink. Unlike ice, Chill Rocks provides a smooth chill that does not overwhelm the character of your beverage. Each set of Chill Rocks comes with nine finely crafted cubes made from 100% pure soapstone. Chill Rocks is a great gift for anyone who loves the perfectly chilled beverage.You can even use it as a conversation starter at your next party. Simply keep the Chill Rocks in your freezer until you are ready to chill your favorite drink or beverage.. Use: Rinse before first usage then place in your freezer until the stones reach desired coldness. When ready, add two or three stones to your glass. Fill the glass with enough liquid to cover the stones. Let the drink sit for a few minutes, allowing the stones to properly chill your drink. After use, simply rinse and allow the stones to dry before placing them back in the freezer. Never chew or attempt to eat. About Soapstone: Known for its ability to maintain a temperature for long periods of time, natural soapstone is listed as Generally Regarded As Safe (GRAS) by the FDA. Soapstone is made up of talc which will not react to water, alcohol and or other drinks. If used with care, soapstone will not scratch your glasses. Proper Usage: Chill Rocks are not meant to cool as a drink as quickly or as much as ice. They are intended to provide a slight chill-between 8 and 15 degrees-that will protect the taste without drowning the quality.
feature_bullets: Contains Nine Chilling Stones Made from Natural Soapstone.
Chill Your Drink while preserving its flavor and not watering it down.
Store in Your Freezer, Ready to Use in Just Hours
Perfect for Whiskey, Vodka, Wine, Cocktails or any other beverage.
No mess and reusable, comes with velvet carrying pouch.
